content: You won't be equipped to absorb this power when you defeat Wandering Wight. This Spirit and all others that you miss can be cultivated at a Keeper's Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wandering_Wight_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Wandering Wight Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Wandering Wight Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
You won't be equipped to absorb this power when you defeat Wandering Wight. This Spirit and all others that you miss can be cultivated at a Keeper's Shrine.
